resources.string: The length of an average dolphin is about 3 meters.
The height of the tallest building in the world, Burj Khalifa, is 0.82 km.
The height of the tallest mountain above the ocean, Mount Everest, is 5.5 miles.
A ship sailing at a speed of 1 knot covered this distance in an hour.
The Great Wall of China is 6.4 mega meters and can be seen from space.
As the name says, it\'s radius of the Earth.
The length of baseball bat is 3.5 ft.
The diameter of a golf ball is 1.68"
A beard grows at an average 7 nano meters in a second. That small!
The length of average red ant 5 millimeters.
The width of Protein Î±-Helix 5 angstroms.
It\'s the radius of a stable hydrogen atom.
It\'s taken to be the huge distance between Earth and Sun.
It\'s officially the smallest unit and is used to describe actions of quantum physics.
The diameter of a Red Blood Cell (RBC) is about 7 microns.
Light from the closest star, next to Sun, would travel for 4.3 years to reach Earth.
